languages.text: "Тебя кличут {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}"героем"{/d}. Пустое слово, никчемный пьедестал среди сотен ему подобных, воздвигнутых рабами ложного бога в их гордыне и недалекости. Этот пьедестал вскоре обратится в жертвенный алтарь — ты станешь очередным мрачным напоминанием для Простора: "герои" не спасут его от Истины".

"They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."
languages.original_text: "Тебя кличут {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}"героем"{/d}. Этот пьедестал вскоре обратится в жертвенный алтарь — ты станешь очередным мрачным напоминанием для Простора: "герои" не спасут его от Истины".

This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

languages.text: “他们说你是个{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}英雄{/d}。‘英雄’是个空洞的词，是个毫无价值的基座，埋没在数百个类似的基座之中。这些基座都是那些傲慢、无知的伪神信徒建造起来的，它们很快就会变成祭祀用的祭坛。而你，你将再次提醒科罗努斯扩区，没有什么‘英雄’可以让它逃脱真理的掌控。”
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

traits.locale_text: “他们说你是个英雄。‘英雄’是个空洞的词，是个毫无价值的基座，埋没在数百个类似的基座之中。这些基座都是那些傲慢、无知的伪神信徒建造起来的，它们很快就会变成祭祀用的祭坛。而你，你将再次提醒科罗努斯扩区，没有什么‘英雄’可以让它逃脱真理的掌控。”

languages.text: "Man nennt Euch {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|einen Helden|eine Heldin}{/d}. Ein leeres Wort, ein wertloses Podest unter Hunderten ähnlichen, alle von Lakaien des falschen Gottes errichtet, in ihrer Hybris und Arroganz. Dieses Podest wird schon bald zu einem Opferaltar werden, und Ihr werdet nur wie viele vor Euch als Erinnerung dienen, dass kein 'Held' die Ausdehnung vor der Wahrheit retten kann."
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

Ein leeres Wort, ein wertloses Podest unter Hunderten ähnlichen, alle von Lakaien des falschen Gottes errichtet, in ihrer Hybris und Arroganz. Dieses Podest wird schon bald zu einem Opferaltar werden, und Ihr werdet nur wie viele vor Euch als Erinnerung dienen, dass kein 'Held' die Ausdehnung vor der Wahrheit retten kann."

languages.text: « On vous qualifie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|de héros|d'héroïne}{/d}, mais ce n'est qu'un mot vide de sens, un piédestal parmi des centaines d'autres construits par les laquais du faux dieu dans un élan d'orgueil et d'ignorance. Bientôt, ce piédestal se transformera en autel sacrificiel, et vous ne serez ensuite qu'un énième exemple prouvant aux Étendues que les héros ne peuvent les sauver de la Vérité. »
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

traits.locale_text: « On vous qualifie {mf|de héros|d'héroïne}, mais ce n'est qu'un mot vide de sens, un piédestal parmi des centaines d'autres construits par les laquais du faux dieu dans un élan d'orgueil et d'ignorance. Bientôt, ce piédestal se transformera en autel sacrificiel, et vous ne serez ensuite qu'un énième exemple prouvant aux Étendues que les héros ne peuvent les sauver de la Vérité. »

languages.text: «Te llaman {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|héroe|heroína}{/d}. Una palabra vana, un vacuo pedestal entre cientos idénticos, edificados por lacayos del falso dios, presa de la arrogancia y la ignorancia. Ese pedestal pronto se convertirá en altar de sacrificio y tú no serás más que otro recordatorio para la Extensión de que ningún "héroe" puede salvarla de la Verdad».
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

traits.locale_text: «Te llaman {mf|héroe|heroína}. Una palabra vana, un vacuo pedestal entre cientos idénticos, edificados por lacayos del falso dios, presa de la arrogancia y la ignorancia. Ese pedestal pronto se convertirá en altar de sacrificio y tú no serás más que otro recordatorio para la Extensión de que ningún "héroe" puede salvarla de la Verdad».

languages.text: 「彼らはお前を{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}英雄{/d}と呼ぶ。空虚な言葉、同じような何百もの台座の中の無価値な台座、すべては偽りの神の下僕たちが思い上がりと無知で築いたものだ。その台座はやがて生け贄の祭壇となり、お前は真実から救うことのできる『英雄』などいないのだということを、エクスパンスにもう一度思い出させることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはお前を英雄と呼ぶ。空虚な言葉、同じような何百もの台座の中の無価値な台座、すべては偽りの神の下僕たちが思い上がりと無知で築いたものだ。その台座はやがて生け贄の祭壇となり、お前は真実から救うことのできる『英雄』などいないのだということを、エクスパンスにもう一度思い出させることになるだろう」

languages.text: "Sana {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}kahraman{/d} diyorlar. Boş laf, senin gibi yüzlerce maşa var. Sahte tanrının kulları, siz maşaları kibir ve cehalet içinde yarattı. Bu maşalar yakında sunağın parçası olacak. Enginlik'i Hakikat'ten hiçbir kahraman kurtaramayacak. Senin kısa öykün de onlara tekrar ibret olacak."
languages.original_text: "They call you a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}hero{/d}. An empty word, a worthless pedestal among hundreds like it, all built by the lackeys of the false god in their hubris and ignorance. This pedestal will soon become a sacrificial altar, and you will become yet another reminder to the Expanse that no 'hero' can save it from the Truth."

traits.locale_text: “Sana kahraman diyorlar. Boş laf, senin gibi yüzlerce maşa var. Sahte bir tanrının kulları, senin gibi maşaları kibir ve cehalet içinde yarattı. Bu maşalar yakında bir sunağın parçası olacak. Enginlik’i Hakikat’ten hiçbir kahraman kurtaramayacak. Senin kısa öykün de onlara tekrar ibret olacak.”
